name: Mountain View Cabin
description: Cozy cabin with stunning views of the mountains. Perfect for couples or small families.

details.about: House in Las Vegas - Potrerillos. Ideal for families. Fully equipped for 6. Large windows with breathtaking views of the valley. Very quiet and perfect for hiking, climbing, or relaxing.
details.space: The property has a privileged view. Living/dining room windows allow you to appreciate nature with different colors depending on the time of day.
details.rules: Pets and events are not allowed.

name: Lakefront Cabin
description: Relax by the lake in this beautiful cabin with private deck and BBQ area.

details.about: Charming lakefront house in Potrerillos, perfect for families and groups. Private access to the lake and a spacious deck for unforgettable sunsets.
details.space: Spacious interiors with rustic-modern design. The dining and living room open directly to the deck overlooking the lake.
details.rules: No pets allowed. Events permitted with prior agreement.

name: Rustic Cabin Retreat
description: Experience the charm of rustic living with modern comforts. Ideal for nature lovers.

details.about: Rustic cabin in the heart of the mountains, surrounded by forest. A retreat for those who love nature and tranquility.
details.space: Warm interiors with wooden finishes and a large fireplace. Outdoor space with BBQ and dining area under the trees.
details.rules: Pets allowed with extra cleaning fee. No loud parties.

name: Luxury Cabin
description: Spacious luxury cabin with premium amenities, perfect for a special getaway.

details.about: Exclusive luxury cabin in Potrerillos, designed for comfort and style. Perfect for families or groups seeking a premium experience.
details.space: Spacious living room with panoramic windows. Modern kitchen fully equipped. Private deck with hot tub and mountain views.
details.rules: No pets or smoking allowed. Quiet hours after 11 pm.
